author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: * از ملکوت بيان مقصود عالميان نازلشد آنچه که سبب حيات عالم و نجات امم است * نصايح قلم اعلی را بگوش حقيقی اصغا نمائيد * إنّها خير لکم عمّا علی الأرض يشهد بذلک کتابي العزيز البديع
translation: That which is conducive to the regeneration of the world and the salvation of the peoples and kindreds of the earth hath been sent down from the heaven of the utterance of Him Who is the Desire of the world. Give ye a hearing ear to the counsels of the Pen of Glory. Better is this for you than all that is on the earth. Unto this beareth witness My glorious and wondrous Book.
